item.title: Errichto - segment tree
item.description: Segment tree Preliminaries The data structure in this segment tree information according to Antti Laaksonen in the Competitive Programmer’s Handbook comes from [62] P. Sta≈Ñczyk. Algorytmika praktyczna w konkursach Informatycznych, MSc thesis, University of Warsaw, 2006. Basically the original range is stored at some offset that correspond to largest power of two that is greater or equal to the size of the range. For example a size 16 array would be stored at an offset of 16 in the array.
